Adventure Guildsman: Skilled adventurers can offer level 55 buff below. Soldier with buff seriesHave Berserker Spirit, Might, Shield, Wind Walk, Focus, Death Whisper, Guidance, Bless Shield, Blessed Body, Haste, Agility, Vampiric Rage. Mage buff seriesHave Berserker Spirit, Magic Barrier, Shield, Wind Walk, Blessed Soul, Empower, Acumen.
